questions.question: What is the command to initialize a new Git repository?
Which command is used to add changes to the staging area in Git?
What does the 'git commit' command do?
choices: Adds files to the staging area
Pushes changes to a remote repository

questions.question: Which HTML element is used to define the main content of a webpage?
What is the correct way to modify the text 'Hello World!' to 'Hello Timor Leste!' in the HTML file?
choices: Remove 'Hello World!' and add 'Hello Timor Leste!' in a new line

questions.question: After modifying the HTML file, which command should be used to check the status of the repository?
What happens if the test fails when trying to commit changes to the repository?
choices: The commit is accepted, but a warning is displayed
The test is ignored, and the commit is accepted
The repository is automatically reverted to the previous state

questions.question: Which command is used to push local commits to a remote repository?
